settings.title: Change is good.
settings.text:
Please email your order details to our customer service team - support@brandjxb.com and we’ll send you a new size.*

*Do note that if your desired color or size is not currently available, you will receive it as soon as it’s back in stock.

settings.title: SIZE MANIFESTO
settings.text: Inclusion is a priority. Not an afterthought. We are filling the needs of a demographic who is asking for luxury fashion. We don’t think of our customers as extended sized women. We simply think of them as a women demanding quality, style and fit. We are not the inspiration for you. You are the inspiration for us. Our goal is to create culture not crowds. This is about all women supporting each other in life, business, tragedy, success, lifting each other up and recognizing the beauty in all.

settings.bio_content:
This is JXB. We're here to offer a new way to look at inclusion in the fashion industry - as a priority and not an after thought. We are not the inspiration for you. You are our inspiration.

We live in the real world where life is not an exact science, life fluctuates, weight fluctuates,
so our job is to make you look and feel beautiful no matter what your size.

We have created a luxury line meant to satisfy the demands of your collection from work to play. Using only the finest cashmere's sourced from Inner Mongolia to Kurabo denim straight from Japan, every element is thoughtful and created for you.

settings.html_block:
Meet X-pert Saffi

Saffi is no stranger to the power of redefining expectations. Growing up in Southwest London, she developed a keen sense of adventure and fearlessness. Surrounded by curvaceous and powerful women who further preserved the value that healthy is beautiful. In her role as a model and activist, Saffi speaks on behalf of women who often feel poorly represented. Following endless experiences of being told her hips were too big, she quickly developed and spearheaded the Curve Project London, where she and other industry professionals mentored women between the ages of 16-60 about wellness and self-presentation. Eager to not conform, Saffi embodies a dynamic image of what beauty is ever evolving and simply X-traordinary.

What are 5 staples everyone should have in their wardrobe?

A good fitting pair of denim jeans, white button down shirt, a leather jacket, camel coat , and a white or black t-shirt.

What is your ideal denim fit style?

High waisted skinny fit with lots of stretch.

What Xcites you about a brand that is season-less and collection-less?

More classic wardrobe staples to add to my wardrobe that make getting dressed easier. Key pieces are always in style.

What is your best style trick or tip?

If it makes you feel confident, WEAR IT.

What piece is your favorite from the line?

The High waisted leather leggings. They are sexy yet classic.

It is Saturday afternoon, what are you in your closet picking out to wear?

Denim jeans & a fitted tee.

What made you fall in love with fashion?

The level creativity and confidence it allows you to feel. It’s the most consistent form of personal expression in my life.

What gaps have you seen in the size 12-26 industry?

Many brands fail to realize curvy girls want to look and feel fashionable, too! The choices are often limited and dated in style. There should be the same level of diversity that there is across other sizes.

In 3 words how would you describe your style?

Cool, clean, feminine.

How does the line fit your lifestyle?

The pieces are versatile enough to cover most occasions in my life.

Who do you see loving this line?

A fashion forward woman who isn’t afraid to stand out in a crowd.

What inspired you to want to work in fashion?

Being the representation for women like me who I didn’t see in fashion magazines growing up.

What do you want people to know about you?

I’m a dedicated mental health activist & ambassador currently raising money for suicide prevention.

What would surprise people to know about you?

I’m fluent in two Tagalog, Filipino dialects.

What quality to you value most about yourself?

Honest enough to always speak my truth even when it feels uncomfortable.

What advice would you give to your 16 year old self?

Don’t care what other people think of you so much. Your own opinion of yourself is the most valid one of all.

What makes you Xtraordinary?

I’m fearless.

settings.quote_text: Many brands fail to realize curvy girls want to look and feel fashionable, too!
settings.collage_text:
PLACEHOLDER

LOREM IPSUM

settings.html_block:
Meet X-pert Marquita

What are 5 staples everyone should have in their wardrobe?

Black denim, Dark denim, Light denim, Leather jacket, The perfect boot, Sexy lingerie, A great tee, Cozy sweater. ...Sorry that’s more than 5.

What is your ideal denim fit style?

Skinny jeans! I find skinnies are the most flattering for my figure. I like to try other styles but skinny jeans are always my go to.

What Xcites you about a brand that is season-less and collection-less?

I love that JXB is season-less because you can really wear these pieces year round, and the fact that they’re collection-less means you don’t have to wait ages for new pieces they keep updating and adding new options regularly.

What is your best style trick or tip?

I love to play with my style. Some days I’m flirty and feminine...others I like to be more of a tomboy. I don’t like to give myself rules so when it comes to style I think it’s important to check in with yourself and see how you feel that day. You can have a lot of fun when you step outside of your comfort zone and try new things. Don’t take yourself too seriously and stop caring about what other people will think!

What piece is your favorite from the line?

I’m obsessed with the oversized fringe denim jacket and the jeans with the seams down the front.

It is Saturday afternoon, what are you in your closet picking out to wear?

It really depends on what I’m doing that day. If I’m lounging and taking it easy I’ll be in my cashmere robe. If I’m meeting up with friends I’ll probably wear a pair of jeans with a cozy sweater or tee.

What made you fall in love with fashion?

I really started loving fashion when I first realized that the industry was finally opening up to representing and providing for women of all sizes. I never felt like I belonged in the fashion world until I finally started having options to play with.

In 3 words how would you describe your style?

Subtly-sexy, relaxed, cool.

How does the line fit your lifestyle?

I travel a lot so I love that the collection is really versatile, many of the pieces can be worn in different ways which helps with packing light. I love denim so it’s nice to have so many different options to choose from.

Who do you see loving this line?

Women everywhere.... there’s something for everyone!

What inspired you to want to work in fashion?

Growing up I never had the kinds of cute clothing options my friends had, I could never fit into anything at the stores they were shopping at. Women and girls my size were never represented in mainstream media and as a teenager that was a serious struggle for me. I always felt different and at that young age all I wanted was to fit in. I started modeling at 15 and quickly realized that I could have a voice in this industry. I wanted to be that role model that I had always wished I had when I was younger.

Fashion priority: comfort or style?

I really can’t choose. Both are equally as important to me.

What would surprise people to know about you?

I’m extremely adventurous! I love to travel and explore. I’m happiest when I’m learning about new cultures and people. I like to try new things and challenge my fears!

What quality to you value most about yourself?

My ability to connect with people. I like to get to know people and their stories, I try to be as open as possible and judgement free. I’ve been able to learn so much from people... they feel comfortable telling me things because they know I’m coming from a place of acceptance and love rather than judgement.

What advice would you give to your 16 year old self?

I would tell my 16 year old self to trust the timing of your life. Never compare yourself to anyone. If you want to accomplish anything you have to do the work! Be grateful for your experiences, even the negative things that happen to you. Set goals and do not doubt your ability to achieve them for a second. And most importantly, trust your intuition!!

What are some of your secret ambitions?

I’d like to host my own travel show where I travel the world learning and educating people about different cultures.

What makes you Xtraordinary?

My personality and ability to connect with people.

settings.quote_text: I would tell my 16 year old self to trust the timing of your life. Never compare yourself to anyone. If you want to accomplish anything you have to do the work! Be grateful for your experiences, even the negative things that happen to you. Set goals and do not doubt your ability to achieve them for a second. And most importantly, trust your intuition!!
settings.collage_text:
Xpertly Curated

Marquita's Musts

Dark denim , Light denim, Leather jacket , A cozy sweater and The perfect boot.
